title: T206 Ty Cobb Green Portrait PSA 4 for sale with photos
author: Colorado723

posts.post_title: T206 Ty Cobb Green Portrait PSA 4 for sale with photos
posts.post_content:
Hello my name is Doug and I am looking to sell my PSA 4 Ty Cobb Green Portrait
[url]http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=4&u=17829358[/url]
[url]http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=3&u=17829358[/url]

I am asking $2750 as I see them on ebay for $3000 but the price is negotiable so please feel free to make an offer. Thanks
Paypal accepted please and 3% included in the above price.

Doug
Your first post and it's a large ticket item on the BST, people may not be so trusting.

[quote name="Jlighter" post=1041148]Your first post and it's a large ticket item on the BST, people may not be so trusting.[/QUOTE]

This is not my first sale on Net54. I sold on the old website before Leon changed the site as Brass2384. I have sold multiple T206 cards on this site. I changed my login because I recently moved to Colorado.

[quote name="Colorado723" post=1041301]This is not my first sale on Net54. I sold on the old website before Leon changed the site as Brass2384. I have sold multiple T206 cards on this site. I changed my login because I recently moved to Colorado.[/QUOTE]

Ah, I see.  Nevermind then.

Hello All,

I have been speaking with Leon this morning and have changed my member name back to Brass23 from Colorado723. The email address is still the same at [url]doug.brass@gmail.com[/url] for those still interested in the Ty Cobb PSA4 for sale.

Regards,

Doug
